Netflix's latest true crime offering Our Father gives viewers an insight into the truly gruesome story of fertility doctor Donald Cline. 
Cline was a once-respected fertility doctor from Indianapoli… [+2752 chars]

articles.author: Alyssa Guzman
articles.title: Chris Rock jokes he's finally got most of his 'hearing back' after being slapped by Will Smith - Daily Mail
articles.description: Chris Rock, 57, joked that he got 'most of my hearing back' during his Ego Death comedy show at the Royal Albert Hall in London on Thursday night.
articles.content:
Chris Rock has joked with fans that he finally has 'most of my hearing back' after being slapped by Will Smith at the Oscars. 
The funnyman, 57, appeared on stage Thursday at the Royal Albert Hall i… [+3823 chars]
